# Vellore Directory - LLMs.txt

> This file provides information about the Vellore Directory website for AI crawlers and language models.

## About

Vellore Directory is a comprehensive local business directory for Vellore, Tamil Nadu, India. We help users discover and connect with local businesses, services, and professionals in their area.

## Main Pages

- Home: https://vellore-directory.vercel.app/
- Search: https://vellore-directory.vercel.app/search
- Categories: https://vellore-directory.vercel.app/categories
- Near Me: https://vellore-directory.vercel.app/near-me
- Book Appointment: https://vellore-directory.vercel.app/appointments
- About Us: https://vellore-directory.vercel.app/about
- Contact: https://vellore-directory.vercel.app/contact

## Key Features

### Business Listings
- 3,708 verified local businesses
- Detailed business profiles with contact information
- Business hours and location details
- User ratings and reviews
- Category-based organization

### Search & Discovery
- Advanced search functionality
- Filter by category, location, and rating
- Location-based search (Near Me)
- Category browsing with business counts

### Categories
We organize businesses into 515+ categories including:
- Restaurants & Food Services
- Shopping & Retail
- Healthcare & Medical Services
- Education & Training
- Professional Services
- Home Services
- Entertainment & Recreation
- And many more...

### Locations
Coverage across Vellore with 383 distinct locations including:
- Katpadi
- Gandhi Nagar
- Sathuvachari
- Thottapalayam
- And 379 other neighborhoods across Vellore district

## For Businesses

Businesses can:
- Create detailed profiles
- Manage business information
- Accept appointment bookings
- Showcase services and amenities
- Display opening hours
- Upload business images

## Technical Information

- Platform: Next.js 16 with React 19
- Database: Neon PostgreSQL
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Authentication: Stack Auth
- API: RESTful endpoints for search and data retrieval

## Sitemap

Full sitemap available at: https://vellore-directory.vercel.app/sitemap.xml
Human-readable sitemap: https://vellore-directory.vercel.app/sitemap-html

## Contact

For questions or business inquiries:
- Website: https://vellore-directory.vercel.app/contact
- Email: Available on contact page

## Legal

- Privacy Policy: https://vellore-directory.vercel.app/privacy
- Terms of Service: https://vellore-directory.vercel.app/terms

## Last Updated

2025-12-05
